meanings.definition: Derived from multiple clones or cell lines.
meanings.sent1: The polyclonal artwork showcased various styles and techniques.
meanings.sent2: The polyclonal garden displayed a mix of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The polyclonal group of friends had diverse interests and hobbies.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a polyclonal collection of different patterns and colors.
meanings.sent5: The polyclonal classroom had students from various backgrounds and cultures.

meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by a mixture of different antibodies or cells.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a polyclonal treatment for the patient's condition.
meanings.sent2: The polyclonal vaccine provided broad protection against different strains of the virus.
meanings.sent3: The polyclonal choir harmonized beautifully with their diverse voices.
meanings.sent4: Her polyclonal research involved studying the interactions of various antibodies.
meanings.sent5: The polyclonal team of scientists collaborated to develop a new medical breakthrough.
